ClassDecl.Name: ListViewItemStyleProvider
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Base class for all predefined list view item style.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSmallImage
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the small image of an item.</summary> <returns>The small image.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetLargeImage
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the large image of an item.</summary> <returns>The large image.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the text of an item.</summary> <returns>The text.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSubItem
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the sub item text of an item. If the sub item index out of range, it returns an empty string.</summary> <returns>The sub item text.</returns> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item.</param> <param name="index">The sub item index of the item.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetDataColumnCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the number of data columns.</summary> <returns>The number of data columns.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetDataColumn
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the column index of the index-th data column.</summary> <returns>The column index.</returns> <param name="index">The order of the data column.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColumnCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the number of columns.</summary> <returns>The number of columns.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColumnText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the text of a column.</summary> <returns>The text.</returns> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> </Document>

ClassDecl.Name: IListViewItemContent
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Represents the extra item content information of a list view item.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetContentComposition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the composition representing the whole item.</summary> <returns>The composition representing the whole item.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetBackgroundDecorator
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the composition for the extra background decorator. If there is no decorator, it returns null.</summary> <returns>The composition for the extra background decorator.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Install
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Install data of an item to the item content for rendering.</summary> <param name="styleProvider">Style provider for the list view control.</param> <param name="view">The <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::list::ListViewItemStyleProvider::IListViewItemView@s:vl.presentation.controls.list.ListViewItemStyleProvider" /></links> for the list view control.</param> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item to install.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Uninstall
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when the item content is uninstalled from the list view control.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreatePreferredAxis
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a default and preferred <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::compositions::IGuiAxis@s:vl.presentation.compositions.IGuiAxis" /></links> for the related item style provider.</summary> <returns>The created item coordinate transformer.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreatePreferredArranger
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a default and preferred <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiListControl::IItemArranger@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiListControl" /></links> for the related item style provider.</summary> <returns>The created item coordinate arranger.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreateItemContent
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::list::ListViewItemStyleProvider::IListViewItemContent@s:vl.presentation.controls.list.ListViewItemStyleProvider" /></links>.</summary> <returns>The created list view item content.</returns> <param name="font">The expected font of the created item content.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: AttachListControl
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when the owner item style provider in installed to a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiListControl@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiListControl" /></links>.</summary> <param name="value">The list control.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: DetachListControl
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when the owner item style provider in uninstalled from a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiListControl@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiListControl" /></links>.</summary> </Document>

ClassDecl.Name: ListViewContentItemStyleController
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>A list view item style controller with extra item content information.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ListViewContentItemStyleController
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create the item style controller.</summary> <param name="provider">The owner item style provider.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetItemContent
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the extra item content information.</summary> <returns>The extra item content information.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Install
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Install data of an item to the item style controller for rendering.</summary> <param name="view">The <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::list::ListViewItemStyleProvider::IListViewItemView@s:vl.presentation.controls.list.ListViewItemStyleProvider" /></links> for the list view control.</param> <param name="itemIndex">The index of the item to install.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ListViewItemStyleProvider
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a list view item style provider using an item content provider.</summary> <param name="itemContentProvider">The item content provider.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetItemContentProvider
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the item content provider.</summary> <returns>The item content provider.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCreatedItemStyles
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get all created item styles.</summary> <returns>All created item styles.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: IsItemStyleAttachedToListView
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test is an item style controller placed in the list view control. If not, maybe the style controller is cached for reusing.</summary> <returns>Returns true if an item style controller is placed in the list view control.</returns> <param name="itemStyle">The item style controller to test.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetItemContentFromItemStyleController
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get item content from item style controller.</summary> <returns>The item content.</returns> <param name="itemStyleController">The item style controller.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetItemStyleControllerFromItemContent
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get item style controller from item content.</summary> <returns>The item style controller.</returns> <param name="itemContent">The item content.</param> </Document>
